member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:TurningTiresWebAPI.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: Retrieve and post various endpoints about appointments. This contains all data revolving around appointments in the database.

member.summary: AppointmentController Constructor. Instantiate appointment database.

member.summary: Get all appointments currently in the database.

member.summary: Get a specific appointment provided a unique appointment id.
member.param: The unique identifier for this appointment.

member.summary: Get appointment objects provided a unique client id.
member.param: The unique identifier of the client that represents their appointments.
member.returns: List of appointment objects that are registered to the specfic client id.

member.name: M:TurningTiresWebAPI.Controllers.AppointmentController.AddAppointment(System.Int64,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create an appointment to be stored in the database provided a unique client id.
member.param: The unique identifier for the client creating an appointment.
The date when the appointment will take place.
The location where the appointment will take place.
member.returns: The single appointment object that was created. Null otherwise.

member.summary: Delete appointment in the database provided the unique appointment id.
member.param: The unique identifier for this appointment.

member.summary: Delete appointment in the database provided the unique client id. This will delete all appointments pointed to this client id.

member.name: M:TurningTiresWebAPI.Controllers.AppointmentController.UpdateAppointment
member.summary: Update appointment information.
